ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from deleting Opportunity Products or Quotes after an Opportunity is Closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Send to Order Management"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")), OR( (Number_of_Opp_Line_Items__c < PRIORVALUE(Number_of_Opp_Line_Items__c)), (Number_of_Proposals__c < PRIORVALUE(Number_of_Proposals__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity Line Items or Quotes cannot be deleted because the Opportunity is Closed.
